programs.show_description: Wakasagi, small 10-centimetre fish, are the star of Japan's winter fishing season - drill holes in an icy lake for some line fishing and meet fishers who are passionate about conservation efforts.
NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.
The Setagaya Line is a small but central streetcar line in Setagaya Ward - join us as we explore a 450-year-old flea market, visit a temple brimming with cats, and meet members of the community.
NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.
Exploring a fantastic dance play called 'The Snowbound Barrier', from the 18th century, with an ambitious villain defeated by the spirit of a cherry tree in the form of a beautiful woman.
NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.
An in-depth interview programme featuring professionals or experts in the world who share their unique insights, information and analysis.
Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.
This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.
An in-depth interview programme featuring professionals or experts in the world who share their unique insights, information and analysis.
Peaches take the spotlight - from June to October, new varieties appear every two weeks letting people enjoy them for months. Big, sweet and juicy, discover the charm of Japan's finest peaches.
Off to Go Bathing: A mother and daughter brave the rain to visit their local bathhouse - in the process, we learn that regular bathing was an essential part of life for townspeople.
From regulating the body's internal clock to possibly curing Parkinson's disease, mushrooms have been revealing one amazing ability after another!

Japanese pizza entrepreneur Masuko Yosuke is revolutionising the restaurant industry in Vietnam and beyond, working to spread happiness through delicious food, great hospitality and green initiatives.
